publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4101 Robert Brown: Scottish Government Must Accept the Will of Parliament on Glasgow Community Court—That the Parliament notes the decision of the Scottish Government not to proceed with the establishment of a community court in Glasgow; further notes the Parliament’s resolution on the matter on motion S3M-4065 on Thursday 7 May 2009; calls on the Scottish Government to accept the will of the Parliament on the matter, to reverse its decision and to progress plans for a community court in Glasgow, and also calls on the Cabinet Secretary for Justice to make an urgent statement to the Parliament on the matter.

S3M-4101 Scottish Government Must Accept the Will of Parliament on Glasgow Community Court (lodged on 8 May 2009) Ross Finnie*, Mike Pringle*, Jackie Baillie*, Mike Rumbles*, Jim Tolson*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-4101 Scottish Government Must Accept the Will of Parliament on Glasgow Community Court (lodged on 8 May 2009) Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-4101 Scottish Government Must Accept the Will of Parliament on Glasgow Community Court (lodged on 8 May 2009) Hugh Henry*, Alison McInnes*
S3M-4101 Scottish Government Must Accept the Will of Parliament on Glasgow Community Court (lodged on 8 May 2009) Nicol Stephen*
S3M-4101 Scottish Government Must Accept the Will of Parliament on Glasgow Community Court (lodged on 8 May 2009) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-4101 Scottish Government Must Accept the Will of Parliament on Glasgow Community Court (lodged on 8 May 2009) Robin Harper*
